siteMetadata.title: Computational Visualization Center
siteMetadata.description: A cross-disciplinary effort to develop and improve the technologies for computational modeling, simulation, analysis, and visualization.

projectTiles.name: DEDRECON
projectTiles.description: Advanced machine learning applied to real-life image visual perception under multi-modality fusion techniques

projectTiles.name: Video Imputation
projectTiles.description: On-the fly error-recovery in adaptive streaming, compression, and super resolution

projectTiles.name: MCE-VAE
projectTiles.description: Invariance-based multi-clustering of latent space embeddings for equivariant learning

projectTiles.name: Sample Complexity
projectTiles.description: Theoretical conditions and algorithmic developments enabling sample-efficient reinforcement learning

projectTiles.name: Optimal Control
projectTiles.description: Optimal control problem solving by applying the Pontryagin maximum principle and then solving for a Hamiltonian dynamical system

projectTiles.name: Adversarial Cloaking
projectTiles.description: Patch-based adversarial attack pipeline for training adversarial patches on 3D human meshes

projectTiles.name: Camera ISP
projectTiles.description: Structured deep learning models that solves the heterogeneous image artifact filtering problem

projectTiles.name: Angstrom
projectTiles.description: Multi-resolution geometric data structures and computational mathematics algorithms

projectTiles.name: Spectre
projectTiles.description: Smart data structures and prediction optimization with provable guarantees for spectral and geometric processing

projectTiles.name: Generative Material Design
projectTiles.description: Semi-supervised variational inference for generative materials design

projectTiles.name: Rank-ordered Search-and-Score
projectTiles.description: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning for sample efficient Rank-ordered Search-and-Score of giga-pixel images

projectTiles.name: Physics-informed Neural Networks
projectTiles.description: Robust physics-informed neural networks for solving partial differential equations by capturing the physics induced constraints

projectTiles.name: Theoretical Bound for OCF Algorithm
projectTiles.description: This work aims to provide a more solid theoretical and mathematical understanding of optimal control flow (OCF) algorithm.

projectTiles.name: Real Time Processing of Hyperspectral Video
projectTiles.description: This project showcases various aspects of processing hyperspectral video streams in real-time using advanced machine learning techniques.

projectTiles.name: Dueling Neural ODEs
projectTiles.description: Dueling Neural ODEs seek to enforce stability in learning forward and adjoint dynamic.

projectTiles.name: Actionable Intelligence for Combating Parkinson's Disease
projectTiles.description: Quick and efficient extraction of patient specific SBR Ratios

projectTiles.name: OC Protein Side-Chain and Folding
projectTiles.description: This work aims to solve the side-chain packing and protein-folding problem with a continuous RL framework.

projectTiles.name: Night-time Aerial Material Segmentation
projectTiles.description: A low-cost solution for robust night-time material segmentation using hyperspectral data with RGB imagery.

projectTiles.name: Dynamic Belief Games
projectTiles.description: Predictive Intelligent Networking agents for rapid response decision-making in dynamic, adversarial communication networks.

projectTiles.name: SHASTRA
projectTiles.description: CSCW-based collaborative geometric modeling, simulation, interrogative visualization, and design prototyping on networked systems.

projectTiles.name: Subsurface Flow Modeling
projectTiles.description: Advanced computational methods for modeling and visualizing subsurface flow dynamics in complex geological formations
